title: Skeleton Father and Son Doing the Bon Dance
marks:
Signature, Inscription, Stamp, and Label

L edge Bottom left
description: adult skeleton in profile, mid-stride with PR arm extended over head; PL arm bent downward, holding the arm of a child skeleton who is mimicking the adult\'s pose; child\'s PR arm extended, clutching red stamp in its skeleton fingers; father\'s mouth is wide open, showing sharp teeth and long, serpent-like tongue; inscription at L side
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
